chat.onboarding.greetNoObj:
Hello! I'm your CourseCopilot. I see you want to create a **{env}** course on **"{title}"**.

To build the perfect structure for you, I need to know a bit more.

**What is the main goal you want your participants to achieve by the end of this course?**
chat.onboarding.greetWithObj:
Hello! I'm your CourseCopilot. I see you want to create a **{env}** course on **"{title}"**.

I've noted your learning objectives:

{los}

Great. Could you tell me more about your target audience and the depth/tone you prefer so I can refine the structure?

validation.modulesMismatch: Module titles mismatch between Structure and Slides (missing/extra)

validation.durationMismatch: Module durations mismatch between Structure and Workbook
header.title: CourseCopilot
homepage.hero.title: Create Complete Educational Courses in Minutes with AI
homepage.hero.subtitle: Your personal co-pilot for designing engaging learning experiences, from structure to final exam. Perfect for trainers, teachers, and consultants.
homepage.whyUs.title: A Smarter Way to Build Courses
homepage.whyUs.subtitle: Go from idea to a fully-structured, ready-to-teach course faster than ever before.
homepage.whyUs.feature1.title: Instant Content Generation
homepage.whyUs.feature1.desc: Save hundreds of hours. Generate everything from the agenda and slides to exercises and tests with a single click.
homepage.whyUs.feature2.title: Pedagogically Sound
homepage.whyUs.feature2.desc: Our AI is trained on proven educational principles, ensuring your content is not just fast, but also effective and engaging.
homepage.whyUs.feature3.title: Multi-Language Support
homepage.whyUs.feature3.desc: Create course content in major world languages to reach a global audience, regardless of your native tongue.
homepage.howItWorks.title: From Concept to Classroom in 4 Simple Steps
homepage.howItWorks.step1.title: 1. Define
homepage.howItWorks.step1.desc: Tell the AI about your course: title, subject, and target audience.
homepage.howItWorks.step2.title: 2. Generate
homepage.howItWorks.step2.desc: Work through each section, generating AI content sequentially.
homepage.howItWorks.step3.title: 3. Refine
homepage.howItWorks.step3.desc: You are in full control. Edit and customize the generated content to add your personal touch.
homepage.howItWorks.step4.title: 4. Launch
homepage.howItWorks.step4.desc: Export your complete course materials and deliver an impactful learning experience.
homepage.pedagogy.title: Built on a Solid Educational Foundation
homepage.pedagogy.subtitle: We've integrated proven learning theories directly into our AI to ensure high-quality outcomes.
homepage.pedagogy.corporate.title: For Corporate Training
homepage.pedagogy.corporate.merrill.desc: Content is problem-centered and focused on real-world application.
homepage.pedagogy.corporate.bloom.desc: Objectives progress from basic knowledge to higher-order thinking.
homepage.pedagogy.corporate.andragogy.de: Material is relevant, practical, and respects the learner's experience.
homepage.pedagogy.academic.title: For Academic Courses
homepage.pedagogy.academic.constructivis: Encourages students to build their own understanding through exploration.
homepage.pedagogy.academic.bloom.desc: Emphasis on critical thinking and building strong theoretical foundations.
homepage.pedagogy.academic.scaffolding.d: Concepts are introduced logically, with support for complex topics.
homepage.pricing.title: Choose the Plan That's Right for You
homepage.finalCta.title: Ready to Revolutionize Your Course Creation?
homepage.finalCta.subtitle: Join hundreds of educators and trainers who are building better courses, faster.

dashboard.gettingStarted.subtitle: Follow these simple steps to get started:
dashboard.gettingStarted.step1: Click the 'New Course' button to begin.
dashboard.gettingStarted.step2: Fill in the details about your course topic and audience.
dashboard.gettingStarted.step3: Follow the workspace steps to generate and refine your content with AI.

course.helpModal.title: Welcome to the Course Workspace!
course.helpModal.intro: This is your creative space. Here's how it works:
course.helpModal.step1.title: 1. Follow the Steps
course.helpModal.step1.desc: Work through the course creation process using the steps on the left, from structure to the final test.
course.helpModal.step2.title: 2. Generate Content
course.helpModal.step2.desc: For each step, click 'Generate Content' to have the AI create a first draft for you.
course.helpModal.step3.title: 3. Refine with AI (Pro Tip!)
course.helpModal.step3.desc: To improve only a part of the text, simply select it with your mouse, then use the 'Refine with AI' actions. If no text is selected, the action applies to everything.
course.helpModal.userSteps.title: Your steps
course.helpModal.userSteps.intro: What you need to do, step by step:
course.helpModal.userSteps.step1: Create the course and choose environment
course.helpModal.userSteps.step2: Set the course title and subject
course.helpModal.userSteps.step4: Generate content per step (Slides, Exercises, Manual)
course.helpModal.userSteps.step5: Review and edit text in the editor
course.helpModal.userSteps.step7: Preview slides and apply quick suggestions

homepage.meta.title: Course Copilot - AI Course Generation
homepage.meta.desc: Transform your expertise into complete courses in minutes, not weeks. The AI platform preferred by trainers and companies.
homepage.hero.poweredBy: Powered by Google Gemini. Read more
homepage.hero.subtitle_new: From idea to complete course in 2 hours, not 2 weeks. The platform that scales your educational expertise.
homepage.features.subtitle: Eliminate chaos from your creative process. From old docs to delivery-ready courses, your workflow has never been smoother.
homepage.feature1.title: Import anything, transform into a course
homepage.feature1.desc: Have old presentations or Word docs? Don't toss them. Course Copilot extracts the essence, restructures the info, and creates a pedagogically sound course in seconds.
homepage.feature2.title: You are the architect, AI is the builder
homepage.feature2.desc: Don't settle for random generated text. Define exact structure, modules, lessons, and tone. AI fills the gaps, but you have full editorial control.
homepage.feature3.title: Escape classic frustrations
homepage.feature3.desc: You are never alone in front of a blank page. Our intelligent editor suggests improvements, rewrites complex passages, and generates relevant examples in real-time.
homepage.feature3.subtitle: We understand what you're going through. We built Course Copilot to solve real trainer problems.
homepage.feature3.person1.name: Florin
homepage.feature3.person1.quote: I used to get tired just thinking about aligning 50 slides in PowerPoint. Now, the structure is ready before I finish my coffee.
homepage.feature3.person2.name: Elena
homepage.feature3.person2.quote: Clients want customized courses 'yesterday'. With Course Copilot, I can send them a detailed proposal in 15 minutes.
homepage.feature3.person3.name: Andrei
homepage.feature3.person3.quote: It's hard to keep students attentive. The exercise and case study generation feature transforms my theoretical courses into practical workshops.
homepage.feature4.title: Every trainer's dream: Instant slides
homepage.feature4.desc:
Dreamed of having slides ready structured exactly when you define the course objectives?

Now you have them almost instantly.
No sleepless nights in Canva, no fight for alignment. Just your expertise transformed into a perfect pedagogical flow, ready to present in class or online.
homepage.feature4.quote: We built Course Copilot because we've been there. After hundreds of delivered courses and thousands of hours of manual preparation, we created the solution we always wanted.
homepage.feature4.subtitle: Dreamed of having slides instantly, while thinking about the course structure? Now you have them almost instantly!
homepage.feature4.description: Wasted hours and days, even with AI, fitting slides, fighting in Canva or other apps for a coherent flow? We know, we've been there. Course Copilot generates the complete visual package, ready to present.
homepage.feature4.benefit: Ready to present in class or online
homepage.feature5.title: Artificial Intelligence + Human Expertise
homepage.feature5.subtitle: Not just an algorithm. It's 25 years of training experience, encoded.
homepage.feature5.description: Behind every AI suggestion lie modern instructional design principles. We've integrated validated methodologies (Bloom, Gagne, Merrill) so you deliver transformation, not just information.
homepage.feature5.scientific.title: Scientifically Grounded, Not Just Statistically Generated
homepage.feature5.scientific.desc:
Course Copilot is not just a simple text generator.

Behind every instruction given to the AI lies 25 years of human experience in training and development. We have encoded modern instructional design principles directly into the app's "brain".
homepage.feature5.scientific.point1: Correct Pedagogy: Course structures respect natural cognitive learning flows.
homepage.feature5.scientific.point2: Results Focused: Everything starts from learning objectives, not filler text.
homepage.whyUsNew.mainTitle: Why Do Experts Choose Course Copilot?
homepage.whyUsNew.mainSubtitle: Whether you're a freelancer, L&D manager, or professor, our platform adapts to your needs.
homepage.whyUsNew.card1.title: Speed & Efficiency
homepage.whyUsNew.card1.desc: "I no longer waste 40% of my time with PowerPoints. I generate structure and content in minutes, not days."
homepage.whyUsNew.card2.title: Scalability
homepage.whyUsNew.card2.desc: "My team produces 3 times more courses without hiring new people. ROI in less than 30 days."
homepage.whyUsNew.card3.title: Enterprise Standard
homepage.whyUsNew.card3.desc: "Security, integration, and consistency. Exactly what a Fortune 500 company needs to scale training."
homepage.whyUsNew.title: Why Course Copilot?
homepage.whyUsNew.subtitle: More than just a simple text generator.
homepage.whyUsNew.point1: Focus on educational outcomes, not just content volume
homepage.whyUsNew.point3: Native export to editable formats (PPTX, DOCX)
